website_summaries.verdict: One of few child-safe 3D pen on the market, making it a favorite among parents of kids ages 6 and above.
pros: Pen is oversized and contoured, making it easy for little hands to hold
Updated design feature better internal components for a smoother doodling experience
Outer pen casing is made with proprietary child-safe PCL plastic made in the USA
cons: User instructions aren't as clear as they could be
Some reports that it burns through filaments faster than expected

customer_reviews.title: The initial niece response seems good
customer_reviews.text: My significant other thought this kind of toy would be great for my niece, so I got all research-y and after a couple hours, decided this was a good one for a more or less normal ten year old with no particular experience. Turns out, she really seems to like it! I got a fun picture with a smiling kiddo and a completed project, so that's good!
customer_reviews.author: John Paul L. Finan

customer_reviews.title: Box was missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This item did not arrive in the manufacturers box. It was also missing the half of the plastic refills. The outside envelopes said 24 but in fact one envelope only had 18 and the other 16. I feel like we received something that was used or returned by someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great STEM toy/tool
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and a joy with which to play and create! The safety of the device is a highlight with a tip that will not burn or hurt a curious child. It melts plastic consistently and it could not be easier to use. It charges quickly enough via USB as well. The addition of a small project book with templates and a plastic sheet to "trace" onto is also appreciated! You are only limited by your imagination in terms of what you can create with a 3D pen but having a mental springboard and examples of what can be done is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 11 yr old boy, Mom says " he loves this".
customer_reviews.author: senior

customer_reviews.title: Good 3D Pen for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can do what a 3D printer can do, but for way cheaper. There is also a manual inside the box, which is very helpful for giving ideas on what to make. But one thing I didn't like was that the filament was a bit too pricy, they could've given more for $20 filament. It's a very fun and great way to keep your kids busy for a while!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruhul Amin

customer_reviews.title: Really Neat!!
customer_reviews.text: Really neat! My son is 10 and can operate it on his own. It’s amazing the stuff he has made with this 3D pen!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Stirs the imagination
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 10yr old son. He's trying to get the hang of using it. Great gift to tease their imagination
customer_reviews.author: Adel

customer_reviews.title: NOT IN MANUFACTURERS ORIGINAL BOX
customer_reviews.text: Item does NOT come in manufacturers original box. The items were just put into a cardboard box and all parts were damaged upon opening it. Please keep that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: N Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Eight year old son says it is amazing and a good way to spend time.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It came in a brown cardboard box and the items are inside. No official package. It does not look presentable as I was originally hoping to gift this.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Pen clogs, refills are spendy.
customer_reviews.text: My son saved his money to buy this pen and it clogs all the time. Also look into refills before purchasing as it doesn’t take the average refills that were recommended when we purchased the item. Now I have a disappointed little boy because the pen keeps clogging. Had we known we would have purchased a different 3D pen.
customer_reviews.author: kjellesed

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like a presentable gift
customer_reviews.text: I have not given it to my son yet. It was supposed to be birthday gift but first impression: the box is disappointing (see photo). In other words, there is no actual box - it’s just packing brown box with mailing label, and things inside. For $50, I would expect a better presentation. Luckily, my son is still small and would not care, but if you are purchasing for a gift - think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya Vakulenko

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 6 year old. She was so excited to use it. The product is defective. We tried to put the sticks in and they barely fit. The pen turns on but nothing comes out and then you have to really pull to get the plastic to come back out. The packaging when opened looked like things were missing. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mezombie

customer_reviews.title: You can make anything
customer_reviews.text: Great starter 3D pen. Definitely takes practice and patience. I highly recommend watching a tutorial videos.
customer_reviews.author: KERRY B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, save your money,
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one use and no longer turns on or even charges. What a waste of money. Do not buy this product. Should have read reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: PozLady

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It feels cheap and the output is slow, inconsistent, and really hard to control and do anything with. We could hardly get a simple straight line to come out properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I just dis-like that the product is very not reliable, this is the second one I have but that doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, our box doesn't have these green stencils. Also, the filament is stuck in pen. Can I return and replace it. I have received it last night only.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: packaging
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my grandson xmas,don't know how well it works yet,but i sure can tell you the packaging on thias item sucked!!!! it was just placed in a sm box with intructions very cheap,was hoping for a nice box like most items i get on amazon,this just look like crap
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: No Plastics Included
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited to try this, but there are no plastics included. Please help us remedy this, ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is like a glorified glue gun, definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool. I find myself stealing it from my 7 year old. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all the parts are there.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive charger, please advise on how to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use, and great for making own characters
customer_reviews.text: I created this little guy on my first outing. Really enjoying this pen.
customer_reviews.author: MayaDylon

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: This pen is so unreliable! If filament breaks inside it, the pen gets stuck and it is no longer usable at all. Frustration is so high that kids get very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Junk pens, sorry.
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. They get clogged very easily and hard to fix. Bought several for my class and they all went defective. You can only use the filament sent with them and not from other 3D printers. Using other pens with hot tips but at least they last and work well for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Clogs and then breaks easily! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The first pen we bought stopped working on Christmas Day! So sad! So I was able to exchange it at the big craft store I bought it from. The next one worked well for a few months of intermittent use, then got clogged and wouldn’t work. We took it apart and there was at least a table spoon of clogged material from the times we had used it. The wires broke off and we were unable to use it after that! Such a waste. We’ll be buying a better quality one this next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Used for a few minutes before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Literally came in today used it for about 3 minutes and now doesn’t work.... unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: I was super exited to get this for my daughters birthday because she had really wanted it. But after testing it out for the first time it stopped working completely. After multiple tries and google searches we gave up. My daughter was super dissapointed, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ezm

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This pen stopped working on the second day! A VERY disappointing gift for me 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 3Doodler Start Essentials (2020) 3D Pen Set for Kids, Easy to Use, Learn from Home Art Activity Set, Educational STEM Toy for Boys & Girls Ages 6+
product_meta.description: Color:Essentials 3d Pen SetWith the new 3Doodler start your creative kids can finally bring all of their wonderful and imaginative ideas to life in 3D. This kid-safe 3D printing pen melts plastic that cools and hardens rapidly, allowing kids to literally draw in the air!
feature_bullets: [THE ONLY CHILD-SAFE 3D PEN] Designed with no hot parts, completely safe for kids aged 6+. Pen nozzle and plastic can be touched with no burn risks. Uses only the safest 3Doodler Start plastic filaments.
[NEW & REFINED] The 2020 edition of the 3Doodler Start features refined extrusion gears for a smoother 3D Drawing experience.
[STEM LEARNING AT HOME] As a tactile learning toy, the pen inspires creativity, design, planning, building and spatial understanding.
[PLASTIC MADE IN THE USA] The 3Doodler Start uses a proprietary child-friendly PCL plastic made at our production facility in Ohio.
[NEW 3DOODLER APP] Get an interactive experience and doodle right on the screen using your 3Doodler Start! The app is packed with easy to follow stencil section instructions!

[THE COMPLETE 3D PEN KIT FOR KIDS] Each box includes 3Doodler Start 3D Pen, DoodlePad/Doodlemat, 2 Mixed-color Packs of Start plastics (48 Strands), Micro-USB Charger & Activity Guide + a ton of creative potential. Comes in a certified & sustaible packaging!
[NO RISK PURCHASE] 365 day policy. You may contact help@the3doodler for tips, tricks and assistance!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars327 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
